alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 10:47PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR FRANKLIN...CENTRAL CRAWFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 1046 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Cass to 2 miles northwest of Ozark to 7 miles southeast of Mulberry to 2 miles north of Lavaca, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Charleston... Mountainburg... Alma... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Altus... Branch... Denning... Chester... Wiederkehr Village... Bloomer... Lake Fort Smith... Fern... Fort Chaffee... Kibler... Jethro... Bidville... Locke... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 12 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 23 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
